title: 108_hr5296
content: The Act titled the "Crosby-Puller Combat Wounds Compensation Act" allows for the continuation of special pays and allowances for members of the Armed Forces wounded or injured in combat zones. The "Crosby-Puller Combat Wounds Compensation Act" ensures that members of the Armed Forces wounded in combat zones will continue to receive incentive pay until they are fit for duty, discharged, or deceased.
